incomeTaxes.name: Personal Income Tax
incomeTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Basic tax-free allowance applies. Additional allowances for dependents. Municipal taxes (average 7%) apply on top of these rates.

wealthTaxes.name: Securities Account Tax
wealthTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Applies to securities accounts exceeding â‚¬1 million. Not a comprehensive wealth tax but specific to financial instruments.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Standard Capital Gains Tax
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Most capital gains from private assets are tax-exempt. Professional trading gains are taxed as regular income.

capitalGainsTaxes.name: Substantial Shareholding Capital Gains
capitalGainsTaxes.notes: 2024 tax year. Applies to sales of substantial shareholdings (>25%) to companies outside EEA.
